gate1.notes: Deterministic HMM. No NaN, no constant output, all autocorrelations < 0.99. Fixed from attempt 1 (autocorr > 0.99 rejected by datachecker).

gate2.notes: MI PASS (+16.16%), VIF PASS (1.66), Stability marginal FAIL (0.156 vs 0.15 for regime_prob). Proceeded to Gate 3 per VIX/Technical precedent.

gate3.notes: PASS on DA (+0.76%) and MAE (-0.0866, 8.7x threshold). MAE improved in 4/5 folds, Sharpe improved in 4/5 folds.
